name: JADU jigsaw
description:
JADU jigsaw is a jigsaw puzzle game, join scattered pieces of image to complete the puzzle.

Features -

1. 12 different categories to select images
2. 1 Free Weekly Image.
3. 3 levels - Easy ( 25 Pieces ) , Medium ( 64 Pieces ) and Hard ( 100 Pieces)
4. Game zoom option.
5. Choose 6 different background.
6. Auto saving and continue playing previously saved games.
